text: Rasel Miah(popularly known as Rasel miah) is a Bangladeshi film actor. He won the Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Child Artist for the film Rajlakshmi Srikanta (1992) which he shared with Suborna Shirin. ==Notable films== * Rajlakshmi Srikanta - 1987 * Kashem Malar Prem - 1991 * Tiger - 1997 ==Awards== {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" ! Year !! Award !! Category !! Film !! title: Rasel (actor)
